fullName: Batch GET feature: Get Batch details for a invalid Batch id

labels.name: story
labels.value: Get Batch details for a invalid Batch id

labels.name: testClass
labels.value: Get Batch details for a invalid Batch id

name: Get Batch details for a invalid Batch id
description:
Given: User is on GET method with endpoint {{baseurl}}/batches/batchId/{batchId}
  When: User sends the GET request with invalid Batchid
  Then: User receives 400 Bad Request 
  And: Should receive response as : "errorCode": "ENTITY_DOES_NOT_EXIST", "errorMessage": "Batch not found with Id : 10 "
